summary: This document is a certification from the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands regarding the incorporation of JESPERS, INC. It confirms the filing of Articles of Incorporation and acknowledges the individuals involved in the formation of the corporation.

persons.name: Lieutenant Governor
persons.context: The Lieutenant Governor certifies the incorporation of JESPERS, INC. and acknowledges the filing of Articles of Incorporation.

events.title: Incorporation of JESPERS, INC.
events.description: JESPERS, INC. was officially incorporated in the Virgin Islands.

keyFacts: The document certifies the incorporation of JESPERS, INC. in the Virgin Islands.
The Articles of Incorporation were filed on August 18, 2003.
The Lieutenant Governor's signature and seal are present, indicating official acknowledgment.
